sentences.en: All the deadly sins, indeed, have their own peculiar negation of beauty.
sentences.cn: 确实, 一切遭天罚的大罪都以其奇特的方式损坏美.

sentences.en: Apodeictic : affirmation or negation is taken as necessary.
sentences.cn: 必然的: 其中肯定或者否定被视为必然的判断.

sentences.en: Consensus is the negation of leadership.
sentences.cn: 追求一致是对领导力的否定.
良好的沟通和谈判技能.

sentences.en: Irena shook her head, but in bewilderment, not negation.
sentences.cn: 伊连娜摇了摇头，是困惑，而非拒绝。

sentences.en: Much of what passes for Christianity is a negation of Christ’s teachings.
sentences.cn: 许多被认为是基督教的东西，和基督的教诲是相悖的。

sentences.en: Scope is among the many problems concerning negation.
sentences.cn: 否定伴随着许多问题,否定辖域就是其中之一.

sentences.en: Shaking the head is a sign of negation.
Staff of Negation - The old wand , but instead of charges has a cooldown.
sentences.cn: StaffofNegation否定权杖:老家伙, 不过现在有使用间隔.

sentences.en: The author boxed the compass of negation in his article.
sentences.cn: 该作者在文章中依次探讨了各种反面的意见.

sentences.en: The editor grimaced, gesturing in negation.
sentences.cn: 编辑一脸苦相，做了个拒绝的手势。

sentences.en: The life of an evil man is a moral negation.
sentences.cn: 恶人的生命在道德上是无价值的.

sentences.en: This theory is a negation of all traditional beliefs.
sentences.cn: 这理论否定了一切传统信念.

sentences.en: Unity is an important characteristic of the law of negation of negation.
sentences.cn: 整体性是否定之否定规律的重要特征,但直到现在,对它一直缺乏研究.

sentences.en: Wand of Negation now does 800 damage to summons per use.
sentences.cn: 否定权杖现在对召唤生物造成800伤害(增强).

words.tran_cn: [数] 负的；消极的；否定的；阴性的
否定论；消极论；反对癖性

trans.tran_en: when something is made to have no effect or be the opposite of what it should be
